alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 3:43PM PST until February 24 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 4000 feet, heavy snow expected Thursday and Thursday night. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible Friday through Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 AM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
